data: “THERE are several objections to it, but I’ll take it if you’ll alter it,” Mr. Locket’s rather curt note had said; and there was no waste of words in the postscript in which he had added: “If you’ll come in and see me, I’ll show you what I mean.”
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: british literature
